![](https://www.yourlasthost.com/images/cpanel.png)

**[YourLastHost](https://www.yourlasthost.com):** The only web hosting company that guarantees to be the very last web host that you need. Yes, that’s right: we believe you’ll never want to host anywhere else after hosting with us. We set high standards for our uptime, service, and support. You can confidently choose YourLastHost for any project, big or small. We are particularly proud to offer a combination of powerful features that few companies can match, including 24/7 support, a 90-day money back guarantee, 99.99% uptime, affordable DDoS protection, and RAID-10 disks.

**Bronze Plan:**

- 2 GB SSD Storage
- 100 GB Bandwidth
- 5 Add-on Domains
- 5 Parked Domains
- Unlimited Sub Domains
- Unlimited Email Accounts
- Unlimited Databases
- **$9.95/yr (Use Coupon: LET995CPANELSHARED )**
- **[ORDER NOW](https://www.yourlasthost.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=24)**

**Features of our cPanel Shared Hosting:**

- cPanel Control Panel Access
- Free Comodo SSLs
- CloudLinux Optimized
- Litespeed Web Server
- Nightly Backups
- CloudFlare
- Softaculous 1-Click Installer
- Attracta SEO Tools
- Multiple US and India Locations
- 90 Day Money back
- 99.99% Uptime Service Level Agreement
- 24/7/365 Live Chat and HelpDesk Support

BlockChain, Altcoins, Alipay, WeChatPay, UnionPay,
2CheckOut, RazorPay, WebMoney, Yandex.Money, Qiwi Wallet

- Dual Intel Xeon E5-2660v2 CPU (16 x 3.6 GHz)
- 64 GB RAM
- 6 x 1TB SSDs
- Hardware RAID10
- 100Mbps to 1Gbps Uplink
